Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to when municipalities can enact an exemption or repeal any such exemption for taxes on clothing and footwear
Summary: Allows municipalities to enact an exemption or repeal any such exemption for taxes on clothing and footwear quarterly instead of yearly.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to when municipalities can enact an exemption or repeal any such exemption for taxes on clothing and footwear
